title: Type ID - condensed didone
content:
What font is this?

Thanks,  
Mike

author: micthemod

comments.content:
I agree with you both - the spur at the foot of the G matches Bodoni Poster Compressed & Onyx (Bitstream version). Interestingly, the other 3 versions of Onyx ( [http://www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=onyx](http://web.archive.org/web/20080208043016/http:/www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=onyx "http://www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=onyx")) have different shaping in this area. I think i’m going to go with the Bodoni version.

Thanks both of you for your help & time.

Mike
